publications.title: Generation of two induced pluripotent stem cell lines from a patient with Stargardt Macular Dystrophy caused by the c.768G > T and c.6079C > T mutations in ABCA4

donor.disease_description: Autosomal recessive Stargardt disease caused by compound heterozygous mutations in ABCA4 gene

genomic_modifications.description: Compound heterozygous mutations c.768G > T and c.6079C > T in ABCA4 gene
genomic_modifications.genotype: Compound heterozygous for ABCA4 c.768G > T and c.6079C > T

genomic_characterisation.summary: Digital karyotyping and CNV analysis showed normal 46,XY karyotype with no chromosomal alterations detected.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal plasmids containing OCT4, SOX2, KLF4, L-MYC, LIN28, shRNA for p53 and miR-302/367

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
